member.name: T:Inject.IInjectContainer
member.summary: A dependency injection container that stores type registrations and instances, and creates new types.

member.name: M:Inject.IInjectContainer.Register(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Register a type in the container.
member.exception: Type is already registered or does not derive from .

member.name: M:Inject.IInjectContainer.Register(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Register an instance in the container.
member.exception: Type is already registered or instance is not of the same type as .

member.name: M:Inject.IInjectContainer.Resolve(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolve a type and return a concrete instance.
member.remarks: If the given type is not registered, the type is constructed using the public constructor.
member.exception: A type failed to create or a circular reference is detected.

member.name: T:Inject.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.Argument_TypeAlreadyRegistered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type {0} already registered..

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.Argument_TypeShouldInherit
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type {0} does not inherit {1}..

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.ResolutionFailed_CannotCreateInterface
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot create non-concrete type {0}..

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.ResolutionFailed_CircularReference
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type: {0} contains a circular reference. Creation path: {1}.

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.ResolutionFailed_CreationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Exception encountered creating type {0}..

member.name: P:Inject.Properties.Resources.ResolutionFailed_WrongNumberConstructors
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot create type {0}. Type must contain only 1 constructor..

member.name: T:Inject.ResolutionFailedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a type fails to resolve.

member.name: M:Inject.ResolutionFailedException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Inject.ResolutionFailedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specifed error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Inject.ResolutionFailedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specifed error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The inner exception that is the cause of the exception.
